examples.translation: When the communication was interrupted, [he/she/it] didn't call again.

examples.text: En iyi itemler ejderhaları kesince düşüyor.
examples.translation: The best loot drops when you slay dragons.

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish كسمك (kesmek), from Proto-Turkic *kes- (“to cut”). Cognate with Old Turkic [script needed] (kés-), Chuvash кас (kas).
